005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.ext.typographic.TypographicQuotes;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlWriter;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderer;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererContext;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRendererFactory;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.renderer.NodeRenderingHandler;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.FlexmarkHtmlConverter;
016import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlMarkdownWriter;
017import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeConverterContext;
018import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRenderer;
019import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRendererFactory;
020import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.HtmlNodeRendererHandler;
021import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
022import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.block.NodePostProcessor;
023import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.block.NodePostProcessorFactory;
024import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.DoNotDecorate;
025import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Document;
026import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
027import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.NodeTracker;
028import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataHolder;
029import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.MutableDataHolder;
030
031import org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
032
033import java.util.Collections;
034import java.util.Set;
035
036import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
037import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
038
039public class HtmlQuoteTagExtension
040    implements Parser.ParserExtension, HtmlRenderer.HtmlRendererExtension,
041    FlexmarkHtmlConverter.HtmlConverterExtension {
042
043  /**
044   * Construct a new extension instance.
045   *
046   * @return the instance
047   */
048  public static HtmlQuoteTagExtension newInstance() {
049    return new HtmlQuoteTagExtension();
050  }
051
052  @Override
053  public void rendererOptions(MutableDataHolder options) {
054    // do nothing
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public void parserOptions(MutableDataHolder options) {
059    // do nothing
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public void extend(HtmlRenderer.Builder rendererBuilder, String rendererType) {
064    rendererBuilder.nodeRendererFactory(new QTagNodeRenderer.Factory());
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public void extend(Parser.Builder parserBuilder) {
069    parserBuilder.postProcessorFactory(new QuoteReplacingPostProcessor.Factory());
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public void extend(FlexmarkHtmlConverter.Builder builder) {
074    builder.htmlNodeRendererFactory(new QTagHtmlNodeRenderer.Factory());
075  }
076
077  static class QTagNodeRenderer implements NodeRenderer {
078
079    @Override
080    public @Nullable Set<NodeRenderingHandler<?>> getNodeRenderingHandlers() {
081      return Collections.singleton(
082          new NodeRenderingHandler<>(DoubleQuoteNode.class, this::render));
083    }
084
085    protected void render(@NonNull DoubleQuoteNode node, @NonNull NodeRendererContext context,
086        @NonNull HtmlWriter html) {
087      html.withAttr().tag("q");
088      context.renderChildren(node);
089      html.tag("/q");
090    }
091
092    public static class Factory implements NodeRendererFactory {
093
094      @Override
095      public NodeRenderer apply(DataHolder options) {
096        return new QTagNodeRenderer();
097      }
098
099    }
100  }
101
102  static class QuoteReplacingPostProcessor
103      extends NodePostProcessor {
104
105    @Override
106    public void process(NodeTracker state, Node node) {
107      if (node instanceof TypographicQuotes) {
108        TypographicQuotes typographicQuotes = (TypographicQuotes) node;
109        if (typographicQuotes.getOpeningMarker().matchChars("\"")) {
110          DoubleQuoteNode quoteNode = new DoubleQuoteNode(typographicQuotes);
111          node.insertAfter(quoteNode);
112          state.nodeAdded(quoteNode);
113          node.unlink();
114          state.nodeRemoved(node);
115        }
116      }
117    }
118
119    public static class Factory
120        extends NodePostProcessorFactory {
121      public Factory() {
122        super(false);
123        addNodeWithExclusions(TypographicQuotes.class, DoNotDecorate.class);
124      }
125
126      @NonNull
127      @Override
128      public NodePostProcessor apply(Document document) {
129        return new QuoteReplacingPostProcessor();
130      }
131    }
132  }
133
134  static class QTagHtmlNodeRenderer implements HtmlNodeRenderer {
135
136    @Override
137    public Set<HtmlNodeRendererHandler<?>> getHtmlNodeRendererHandlers() {
138      return Collections.singleton(new HtmlNodeRendererHandler<>("q", Element.class, this::renderMarkdown));
139    }
140
141    protected void renderMarkdown(Element element, HtmlNodeConverterContext context,
142        @SuppressWarnings("unused") HtmlMarkdownWriter out) {
143      context.wrapTextNodes(element, "\"", element.nextElementSibling() != null);
144    }
145
146    public static class Factory implements HtmlNodeRendererFactory {
147
148      @Override
149      public HtmlNodeRenderer apply(DataHolder options) {
150        return new QTagHtmlNodeRenderer();
151      }
152    }
153
154  }
155
156  public static class DoubleQuoteNode
157      extends TypographicQuotes {
158
159    /**
160     * Construct a new double quote node.
161     *
162     * @param node
163     *          the typographic information pertaining to a double quote
164     */
165    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ConstructorCallsOverridableMethod")
166    public DoubleQuoteNode(TypographicQuotes node) {
167      super(node.getOpeningMarker(), node.getText(), node.getClosingMarker());
168      setTypographicOpening(node.getTypographicOpening());
169      setTypographicClosing(node.getTypographicClosing());
170      for (Node child : node.getChildren()) {
171        appendChild(child);
172      }
173    }
174  }
175}
